author: jsdelfino
msg: Only run scagen if sca.composite is newer than the generated proxy and wrapper classes, instead of running it all the time. This is similar to what we already do in the samples.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MASSEMBLY-99] added test to integration tests to check that dependency tests are handled correctly.

author: rooneg
msg: Make the new cache tests use an embedded Jetty server instead of hitting
Mark Nottingham's web site.  This defaults to port 8080, but that can be
* build/build.xml: Add the new Jetty stuff, and build the client tests.
Import a bunch of Jetty and Servlet classes.
(setUp): Lazily set up our Jetty server.
(Servlet): A trivial little servlet that handles our server side work.

author: olegk
msg: Fix for [HTTPCLIENT-593]: ProtocolSocketFactory equals and hashCode don't support subclassing
Contributed by Chris Audley <chrisaudley at yahoo.com>
Reviewed by Oleg Kalnichevski, Ortwin Glück and Roland Weber

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-415.  Replace some uses of DatanodeDescriptor in the DFS web ui code with DatanodeInfo, the preferred public class.  Contributed by Devaraj.
